snippet: The April gain was led by a 1.9 percent increase in restocking of autos and auto parts.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports stockpiles at wholesale level rose 0.2 percent in April to $504.8 billion, and sales rose 0.5 percent; economy grew at 2.4 percent annual rate in first quarter.
lead_paragraph: The April gain was led by a 1.9 percent increase in restocking of autos and auto parts.

headline.seo: Wholesale Stockpiles and Sales Improved in April
headline.main: Business Picked Up in April for Wholesalers, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Business Picked Up in April For Wholesalers, U.S. Says
